entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:17 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
